summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3357, for the improvement of East Marginal Way from West Spokane Street to a point about four hundred (400) feet north of the north margin of West Spokane Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 41447 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
